report.title: Trending people report using standard filter
report.description: Gives a list of top 10 recent contributors, with their number of records. Ideal for populating a 'trends cloud'.
report.query: SELECT *, greatest(11, cast((15 - (sqrt(#records_to_scan#) / sqrt(records)))*2 as integer)) as font_size FROM ( SELECT case position(',' in recorders) when 0 then recorders else regexp_replace(recorders, '(.+), ', '') || ' ' || regexp_replace(recorders, ',(.+)', '') end as recorders, count(id) as records FROM (SELECT o.id, o.recorders FROM cache_occurrences o #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE COALESCE(o.recorders, '') not in ('admin', '') AND #sharing_filter# #filters# ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #records_to_scan#) list GROUP BY case position(',' in recorders) when 0 then recorders else regexp_replace(recorders, '(.+), ', '') || ' ' || regexp_replace(recorders, ',(.+)', '') end ORDER BY count(id) DESC LIMIT #recorders_to_return# ) AS list ORDER BY recorders ASC
